title: "Kubota and Accenture Establish Joint Venture for a More Sustainable Society"
excerpt: "Kubota Data Ground will be a subsidiary with strategic capabilities in DX that it will use to further contribute to solutions for food, water, and environmental sustainability. In addition, the company will develop digital human resources and a cloud-based digital platform that will strengthen and upgrade existing businesses by connecting internal and external services and data."
